title: PVEGOS Multifunctional Garden Shovel with Handle, Adjustable Stainless Steel Gardening Weed Remover Tool, Outdoor Cleaning Shovel for Weeds and Moss, Edging Spade, Patio Moss Scraper 21cm
features: Quick Weed Remover Tool: The weed remover tool long handle is designed to swiftly eliminate weeds in minutes,the garden shovel head fits seamlessly with the ground, allowing you to remove weeds on the ground at one time.

Heavy Duty Garden Spade: Multifunctional Cleaning Shovel is made of stainless steel and reinforced with multiple rivets, making it more sturdy and durable. Its sharpened edge makes garden scraper easier to dig, chop and pry, meet any of your garden needs.

Ergonomic and User-Friendly: The 1.25-meter three-section stainless steel rod design not only minimizes the pressure on the back and knees but also enhances the stability of the rod, preventing it from bending due to uneven force distribution when digging or scoveling soil.

Multi-purpose Patio Weeding Tool: PVEGO weed remover tool long handle is suitable for a variety of gardening tasks, including scraping, scooping, garden edger tool and remove weeds and moss. This shovel can also be used as a scraper or an extruder, for roof cleaning, deicing, removing small advertising stickers on the floor and walls,etc.

One gardening tool that can simultaneously serve as a garden shovel, scraper, weeding tool, spade, and other gardening accessories is definitely the perfect gift for gardening enthusiasts! This scraper is adjustable length and can be disassembled for independent use, suitable for yards, kitchens, living rooms, bathrooms, garages, and cars.
Key note: Install screws properly. lf front-installed screws loosen, try installing from the back - they hold tighter. For support, contact us for 24hr response.
description: Product Description Multifunctional Garden Shovel, Moss Weed Remover Tool Our high quality garden shovel is made from stainless steel with a strong and durable head throughout and a sharp edge to make digging, chopping and prying easier, perfect for all your gardening needs. Your Essential Multi-Purpose Garden Shovel Has the overgrown weeds affected your beautiful garden? No way to deal with the moss? Wall debris and advertisements can't be cleaned? Choose our PVEGOS multi-functional garden shovel, and all the above problems will be easily solved! Premium Construction For Maximum Durability Stainless steel blade The Garden moss scraper engineered for superior wear resistance, this robust material outlasts ordinary shovels, handling demanding tasks effortlessly. Package Including Our gardening set comes with three poles, screws and shovels. This moss removal tool ensures effective removal of weeds and moss without causing tension in your hands. Strong and corrosion-resistant Our triangular welds prevent bending/snapping under heavy loads. Note: Install screws properly. If front-installed screws loosen, try installing from the back – they hold tighter. Three-segment rod design, freely adjustable The three-section stainless steel rod design greatly meets the different needs of your gardening work. It is easy to install. Just tighten the rods and it can be used immediately. Multifunctional Garden Cleaning Shovel This Multi-Purpose Tool Is Ideal For: Home Use: Kitchen, Bathroom, Garage & Living Areas. Outdoor Spaces: Gardens, Farms & Livestock Enclosures. Surface Types: Effective On Tile, Marble, Wood & Concrete. Perfect For Gardening Enthusiasts And Makes A Practical Gift.
